# Centra Solusi Bisnis - Next.js Website

## Project Overview
Professional business website for Centra Solusi Bisnis using Next.js with admin SEO management.

## Stack
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React

## Features
- Professional responsive design
- Multiple pages: Home, About, Services, Contact
- Admin dashboard for SEO management
- Contact form functionality
- SEO optimization
